column5: Well I know the season isn't even over yet hahaha... but I had to wade through enough footage as it was from this season.  Just wanted to say thank you to everyone I fished with this year.... I learned something everytime I went out (even if it was 'what NOT to do' haha)  All I can say as that we are lucky in southern Ontario to have this at our fingertips !  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Ng2Qb5gDpo&feature=youtu.be
Nice work buddy!  Some great fish in there,  looking forward to the winter edition
Great Video! You guys are training up a bunch of new-geners, right on
Yes...and they aren't even my kids hahah... We learned an early lesson "DONT TELL PEOPLE WHERE I AM TAKING YOU FISHING" hahahaha
Great vid.  And season.  Man, that spot of yours sure coughs up alot of different species.
good video  but it should be called netting, posing and releasing, didn't see much fishing.....lol
Niagara River has it all!  Such an awesome fishery.
Good to see all the young ones enjoying themselves. Great video

Bahahaaa... classic.. hilarious that they probably fight as hard as any freshwater fish yet we always give those poor guys a bad rap... we definately got some huuuuge ones this year but I didn't have any release shots hahahaaha...  Thanks guys !
I hear ya, the Rodney Dangerfield of our lakes and rivers lol
